Articles.Content:
Whenever the Kerbals glance over they're shoulder to see the Mun smilling at them, there they stand, just, wondering, the amazing mysteries of its grey, rocky surface.

So, one day the KSP administrators started planning a big plan, to head straight to the Mun!

As soon as the Engineers heard of such a thing being even thought of, they all ran and got there tools in every single place where they could grab them the quickest, some of them even slept with them at night.

Eventually, the plans came and the Engineers went wild, just like when they first got a rocket to even get off the pad, but what was even better, yet not so good at the same time, was the fact that The mission was able to be named by the Engineers, they thought of Aquaris,Neptune, Poisedion and Freedom, but they didn't seem to quite fit the idea, so eventually Jeb came and told them about Polaris, a star which is something around the area of the Mun's path and the fact that he thinks it might be somewhere around the Mun when he go's there, so of course, thats what 'they', as Jeb wasn't actually allowed to name it, named it.

The Engineers really did build that rocket fast and it didn't get delayed at all, they all went day and night day and night, coffee coffee coffee coffee.
